speaker: AGAMEMNON
text:
Hark
              ,
               
              hark
              ,
               
              what
               
              shout
               
              is
               
              this
              ?

speaker: DIOMEDES
text:
The
               
              bruit
               
              is
               
              Hector’s
               
              slain
              ,
               
              and
               
              by
               
              Achilles
              .

speaker: AJAX
text:
If
               
              it
               
              be
               
              so
              ,
               
              yet
               
              bragless
               
              let
               
              it
               
              be
              .

speaker: AJAX
text:
Great
               
              Hector
               
              was
               
              as
               
              good
               
              a
               
              man
               
              as
               
              he
              .

speaker: AGAMEMNON
text:
March
               
              patiently
               
              along
              .
               
              Let
               
              one
               
              be
               
              sent

speaker: AGAMEMNON
text:
To
               
              pray
               
              Achilles
               
              see
               
              us
               
              at
               
              our
               
              tent
              .

speaker: AGAMEMNON
text:
If
               
              in
               
              his
               
              death
               
              the
               
              gods
               
              have
               
              us
               
              befriended
              ,

speaker: AGAMEMNON
text:
Great
               
              Troy
               
              is
               
              ours
              ,
               
              and
               
              our
               
              sharp
               
              wars
               
              are
               
              ended
              .
